abstract: Bill Cunningham captures visitors to Frick Collection wearing orange in honor of Fredrick Leighton painting Flaming June, focus of institution's annual lawn and garden party.
lead_paragraph: Some of the 600 guests at the Frick Collection's lawn and garden party wore the vibrant orange color of a painting that was the focus of the festivities.

headline.main: Bill Cunningham | Flames in the Garden

snippet: Some of the 600 guests at the Frick Collection's lawn and garden party wore the vibrant orange color of a painting that was the focus of the festivities.
